short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast theme toggle enable to quickly switch the website theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast theme toggle it's the ultra-lightweight, minimal, and easy-to-use Google Chrome Extension that enables to quickly switch the website theme. It allows to change the colors from the 'light' version to 'dark' and vice-versa with no configuration required.

IMPORTANT!
The first time you install it, please restart your browser. Then, click on the icon of the extension to switch color.

This is an open source project, so you can see it and contribute on GitHub: https://github.com/rozzilla/fast-theme-toggle.
